advanced-chest.description: Stores items. Quite sturdy, with plenty of storage space. It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

alarm-bell.description: Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base. Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies or focus entirely on work whenever you like.

alpha-wave-generator.description: A device that generates alpha waves to relax Pals. It slows the rate at which the SAN value of allies at the base decreases. Placing more than two will not have any additional effect.

amusement-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Your Pals will keep on working.

antique-bath-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't actually be used to stay clean.

antique-chair-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique desk.

antique-couch-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives the air of luxury to your base.

antique-desk-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Use with an antique chair.

antique-dresser.description: Dresser useful for giving yourself a remake. Allows players to edit their appearence.

antique-high-quality-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Gives an air of stately elegance to your base.

antique-lamp-set.description: Antique lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity.

antique-mirror-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Essential for making sure you look good.

antique-storage-cabinet-set.description: Antique storage cabinet set. Can store items.

antique-storage-set.description: Antique storage furniture set. Can store items.

barricade-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place to keep somewhere off limits.

bathroom-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Can't be used for its original purpose.

bear-trap-large.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on large Pals.

bear-trap-small.description: Immobilizes those who step on it. Only effective on small Pals or humans.

berry-plantation.description: A farm that can grow Red Berries. Harvest time is quick, but eating them doesn't provide much sustenance. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

beta-wave-generator.description: A device that emits beta waves to energize Pals. It increases the work speed of Pals at the base. Placing more than one will not have any additional effect.

campfire.description: Used to make simple food or provide meager warmth and light.

carpet-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place on a foundation in your base for that homey feel.

ceiling-lamp.description: Lights up dark areas below at a base.

clock-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Doesn't actually tell time.

cloth.description: Woven fabric crafted from Wool at a primitive workbench.

cloth-outfit.description: Lightweight starter gear sewn from simple cloth.

coal-mine.description: Facility for producing large quantities of Coal.

cooking-pot.description: Can efficiently prepare more varieties of food.

common-shield.description: Basic wooden shield that improves survivability for early expeditions.

cooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat. A Pal with the Cooling Work Suitability is needed to maintain the cooling effect.

cooler-box.description: Small food vault. Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent food stored inside from spoiling.

defensive-wall.description: Large defensive wall that protects from enemy invasions.

deluxe-bait.description: Bait that lures in Pals. Improved to slightly enlarge the size of the bar in the fishing minigame.

egg-incubator.description: Used for incubating a Pal Egg. If a Pal Egg is left in it, it will automatically hatch after some time has passed.

electric-cooler.description: Cools the nearby area and protects against the heat. Improved range and cooling capabilities.

electric-egg-incubator.description: Device for incubating Pal eggs. Requires electricity, but automatically keeps the inside of the incubator at appropriate temperatures.

electric-furnace.description: Allows refinement of Pal Metal Ingot. It requires Electricity to use, but is quicker to process. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

electric-heater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold. Improved range and heating capabilities.

electric-kitchen.description: Needed for cooking food. It requires electricity to run, but allows a large amount of meals to be prepared rapidly. Requires a Pal with Kindling to light a flame.

electric-medicine-workbench.description: A facility for making Pal medicine. It requires electricity, but can produce high quality medicine. Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

electric-mine.description: Electrocutes those who step on it. Electrocuted Pals are easier to capture.

electric-pylon.description: Place in a base to improve electricity generating speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

emergency-exit-sign-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Apparently a priceless artifact in more civilized times.

feed-box.description: Place food, and Pals at the base will eat from it.

fine-bed.description: Soft bed with improved restorative capabilities. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

fire-arrow.description: Arrow bundle tipped with a Flame Organ to ignite targets.

fire-bow.description: Bow modified with Flame Organs to shoot burning arrows.

fireplace-set.description: Brick fireplace set to provide illumination. Must be lit with fire.

flame-cauldron.description: Place in base to improve fire-making speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

flea-market-items.description: Put up items for sale on multiplayer servers.

flea-market-pals.description: Put up Pals for sale on multiplayer servers.

flower-bed.description: Place in base to improve gathering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

fluffy-pal-bed.description: Pals sleep more soundly, improving the amount of Health and SAN recovered while sleeping.

foxparks-s-harness.description: Harness that lets Foxparks serve as a fiery glider mount.

glass-structure-set.description: Set for building a base using glass. Allows building of glass foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

global-palbox.description: Global Palbox terminal that lets you manage teams from any base.

hand-held-torch.description: Simple handheld torch for lighting caves and night excursions.

hanging-trap.description: Catches Pals that pass through. Only effective on small Pals and humans.

heater.description: Warms the nearby area and protects against the cold.

hexolite-quartz-mine.description: Facility for producing Hexolite Quartz|Hexolite Quartzs. Digging Hexolite Quartzs is grueling physical work. Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

high-quality-hot-spring.description: Facility where Pals on base can rest. Now comfier and restores more SAN.

high-quality-workbench.description: A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear. A small workspace limits production speeds. Requires a Pal that can work with their hands.

hot-spring.description: Facility where Pals on base can rest. Restores SAN after a long day of hard work.

houseplant-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants around your base for a splash of color.

human-powered-generator.description: A facility that converts rotational motion into electrical energy. The efficiency is low, and the Pals working here will experience a decrease in SAN value, but they will gain experience points.

ice-mine.description: Freezes those who step on it. Frozen Pals are easier to capture.

iron-gate.description: Metal gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

ironwood-table-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

japanese-style-structure-set.description: Set for building a base using Japanese-style architecture. Allows building of Japanese-style foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for shelters.

ladder.description: A ladder that allows you to climb to a slightly higher place.

lamp.description: Lights up dark areas at a base.

large-ceiling-lamp.description: Lights up large areas below at a base.

large-mounted-lamp.description: Lights up large areas at a base.

large-pal-bed.description: Fluffy bed to give Pals a good rest. Pans can rest when injured or sleep at night. Even large Pals can sleep soundly on a bed like this.

large-toolbox.description: Place in base to improve handiwork speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

leather-chair-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Leather screams luxury.

lettuce-plantation.description: A farm that can grow Lettuce. It requires a great amount of time to harvest.

logging-site.description: Uses Pals with the Lumbering ability to cut down trees and generate wood

makeshift-handgun.description: A handgun created from spare parts. Relatively suited for close quarters combat, but can only fire one shot before needing to reload.

medicine-rack.description: A shelf for storing medicine. Sick Pals will come here to take their medicine. Be sure to keep the medicine stocked.

medieval-medicine-workbench.description: A facility for making Pal medicine. It can only produce simple medicines. Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

metal-barrel-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Not suitable for doing keg stands.

metal-chair-and-desk-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Match with metal structures and enjoy life with your Pals.

metal-chest.description: Stores items. Reinforced with metal, it is somewhat durable. The increased size allows for the storage of more things.

metal-defensive-wall.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

metal-shelf-set.description: Metal shelf set. Can store items.

metal-structure-set.description: Set for building a base using metal. Allows building of metal foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for building a house.

mill.description: Facility for milling Wheat to produce Flour. Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

monitoring-stand.description: You can command your Pals to work on various things inside a base. Try not to overwork them!

mounted-crossbow.description: Assign a Pal with Handiwork suitability and it will protect a base using the crossbow.

mounted-machine-gun.description: Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation. Requires Rifle Ammo to use. Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

mounted-torch.description: Place it at a base to light the surrounding area.

normal-parachute.description: Basic parachute for safe descents and gliding.

old-bow.description: Early-game bow strung from wood and fiber.

ore-mining-site.description: Facility for producing Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

ore-mining-site-ii.description: Facility for producing large quantities of Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

outdoor-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Spruces up the outside of your base.

pal-dressing-facility.description: Facility that lets you change a Pal's outfit.

pal-essence-condenser.description: A chamber for increasing a Pal's rank. Pals can surpass their physical limitations if given a concentrated extract taken from a Pal of the same type.

pal-gear-workbench.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing Pal tools. Make a saddle to ride Pals, or make a gun for Pals to use.

pal-sphere.description: Standard Pal capture sphere crafted from early resources.

palbox.description: Facility for storing captured Pals. Pals inside gradually recover HP. The area around this structure will become your base.

piano-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place in your base and dream about living a life of luxury.

pickaxe-and-helmet.description: Place in base to improve mining speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

power-generator.description: A Lightning Pal-powered electric generator. Electric equipment won't run without this.

primitive-workbench.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing simple items. Requires a Pal that can work with their hands.

production-assembly-line.description: A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear. By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

production-assembly-line-ii.description: A High Quality Workbench for producing items and gear. Through clever management, production speeds have increased greatly. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

ranch.description: Farm for raising sheep-and fowl-like Pals. Assign a Pal with the appropriate traits to a farm to automatically produce them.

refined-metal-chest.description: Stores items. Made of iron, it is extremely durable. It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

refrigerator.description: Used to store items. A Pal with the Cooling Work Suitability is needed to maintain the cooling effect.

repair-kit.description: Field repair kit for restoring weapon durability.

road-sign-set.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

rushoar-saddle.description: Saddle that allows you to ride Rushoar and charge through obstacles.

sand-bag.description: Pals assigned to it will watch for approaching enemies.

shoddy-bed.description: Human bed. Sleeping restores HP. Sleep at night and time will pass until morning. Cannot sleep unless built under a roof.

silo.description: Place in base to improve planting speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

snowman.description: Place in base to improve cooling speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

sphere-assembly-line.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

sphere-assembly-line-ii.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

sphere-workbench.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. A small workspace keeps the production speed slow. Requires a Pal that can work with their hands.

statue-of-power.description: Make offerings to enhance the stats of the Player and their Pals.

stone-axe.description: Basic axe for chopping down trees.

stone-gate.description: Stone gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

stone-pickaxe.description: Basic pickaxe for mining stone and ore.

stone-pit.description: Uses Pals with the Mining ability to mine down rock and generate Stone

stone-spear.description: Sturdy spear tipped with sharpened stone.

stone-structure-set.description: Set for building a base using stone. Allows building of stone foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for building a house.

storage-container-set.description: Container furniture set. Can store items.

straw-pal-bed.description: Pals at base recover SAN when sleeping in beds at night. Without a bed, Pals cannot sleep soundly, and no SAN is recovered.

street-lamp-set.description: Street lamp set to provide illumination. Requires electricity to light.

stump-and-axe.description: Place in base to improve logging speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

sulfur-mine.description: Facility for producing large quantities of Sulfur.

summoning-altar.description: Offer a Slab depicting a Pal to summon a powerful Pal to your base. Adequate caution and battle readiness is paramount.

tomato-plantation.description: A farm that can grow Tomato. They take time to harvest, but increase the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

tombstone.description: A tombstone that can be inscribed with text. Use it for recording purposes.

traffic-control-set.description: Decorative furniture set. No roads mean no traffic control.

training-dummy.description: Training dummy shaped like a Pengullet.

viewing-cage.description: Container for observing captured Pals. Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production, but they do not become hungry.

wall-mounted-houseplant-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place plants on your base's walls for a splash of color.

wall-mounted-sign.description: A signboard to write on. Can be hung on walls.

wall-torch.description: Place it on a wall to light the surrounding area.

water-fountain.description: Place in base to improve watering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

weapon-assembly-line.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at a faster pace. Requires Pals with Handiwork trait.

weapon-assembly-line-ii.description: Needs electricity but produces weapons and ammunition at an even faster pace. Requires Pals with Handiwork trait.

weapon-workbench.description: An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition. A small workspace prevents the production of high quality weapons. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

wheat-plantation.description: A farm that can grow Wheat. It requires an average amount of time to harvest. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water and harvest crops.

witch-cauldron.description: Place in base to improve the medicine manufacturing speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

wooden-club.description: Simple club carved from wood for close combat.

wooden-chest.description: Used to store items. Place at a base and Pals with Transporting suitability will automatically carry items to it.

wooden-defensive-wall.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

wooden-gate.description: Wooden gate large enough for big Pals to pass through.

wooden-living-room-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Place furniture in your living space and enjoy life with your Pals.

wooden-structure-set.description: Set for building a base using wood. Allows building of wooden foundations, walls, ceilings, stairs and other things necessary for building a house.

wooden-tavern-cabinet-furniture-set.description: Set of wooden cabinets that look at home in a tavern. Can store items.

wooden-tavern-furniture-set.description: Decorative furniture set. Set up a bar and enjoy life with your Pals.
